page.title: 08KINGSKERSWELL/TOURISM
page.content: In our area we have:3 Public houses, 3 Bed and Breakfast houses,1 Restaurant, and a Caravan park.The 3 Public houses are situated all round the area,but none of them offer accommodation.Our 3 Bed and Breakfast houses offer accommodation to anybody who wants it,and often have people staying from abroad. The Restaurant is near the Village Church.It is an old coaching house,and William of Orange dined there when passing through the village to Newton Abbot. The caravan park is situated near our Village School,and is open to the public all year round.It has 27 caravans there in high season. The area is attractive to tourists as it is quieter than the coastal towns,but convienient for visits to Dartmoor and the seaside.
